casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Antorio Maurice SMARR No. 579P01-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Antorio Rice Smarr, for Smarr, Antorio Maurice

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 2nd of July 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Gaston County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of July 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
